H0.text: Of which tribe of Red Indians was Geronimo a chief. Cherokee

H1.text: Of which tribe of Red Indians was Geronimo a chief. Navajo

H2.text: Of which tribe of Red Indians was Geronimo a chief. Sioux

H3.text: Of which tribe of Red Indians was Geronimo a chief. Apache

A4.text: Geronimo was not a chief of the Bedonkohe band of the Central Apache but a shaman, as was Nokay-doklini among the Western Apache.

A5.text: Gerónimo (Mescalero-Chiricahua: Goyaałé, lit. 'the one who yawns', Athapascan pronunciation: [kòjàːɬɛ́]; June 16, 1829 – February 17, 1909) was a military leader and medicine man from the Bedonkohe band of the Ndendahe Apache people.

A7.text: Obituary: Old Apache Chief Geronimo Is Dead
